You can still use R!

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

plot_df = 
  tibble(
    x = runif(100),
    y = 1 + 2*x +rnorm(100)
  )

plot_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
  

```
